1.SceneDescription:
Central Perk, Joey, Monica, and Rachel are sitting on the couch and Ross is
sitting on the chair, and they’re all talking.

lines.Line: Hey! Out of all of us, who do you think is gonna get married next

You have been M.I.A for the past seven sorority newsletters,
what’s up with you?

Wh—(Turns and looks at the gang who’s staring)—Why
don’t I tell you over here? (She walks Melissa away from the gang.

So last I heard you were gonna get married. (Grabs Rachel’s hand
and notices that she doesn’t have a ring on it.) (Sadly) Oh poor Ray-ray
Oh no-no, no! It’s good! It’s all good! I-I actually work at Ralph Lauren

Oh shut up more! Now, are you friends with Ralph

Listen, we-we have to have dinner. What-what are you doing tomorrow
night
Oh tomorrow, oh I don’t know. Um
Oh tomorrow, oh I don’t know. Um
You do now. You’re having dinner with me

I-I’ve got to go. This has been so great Ray-ray! (Gunther returns
with her cigarettes.) Oh, there you are. (Takes them from Gunther.) (To Rachel) Umm, so
listen, just call me. Here’s my card. (Hands the card over.
Oh, wow thanks! (Reading the card) Oh you’re in real estate

Oh no, that’s-that’s an old card. Umm, I wanted to get out of
that and-and do something where I can really help people and-and make a difference
Wow! What do you do now
Wow! What do you do now
Wow! What do you do now

(quietly) I’m a party planner. I’ll see you tomorrow.
(Exits.
Okay! (Joins the rest of the gang.
Okay! (Joins the rest of the gang.
Hey guys! Look who’s back! It’s Ray-ray
Shut up, that was my friend Melissa from college
Shut up, that was my friend Melissa from college
She’s actually very sweet and we used to be very close
Wait a minute, she isn’t… She’s not the one who you
Wait a minute, she isn’t… She’s not the one who you
(excitedly) Who you what? Who you what?
(excitedly) Wow? Wow what?! Wow what?! Who you—what?!

No we weren’t! It was nothing! It was one night, senior year we
went to a party, had a lot of sangria and y’know, ended up…kissing for a
bit
So that’s two of my wives
So that’s two of my wives

2.SceneDescription: Ralph Lauren, Rachel is showing Chandler the selection of tuxedos.

lines.Line:
(motioning to a rack) So now, these are all the tuxedos that we make and
if there’s anything that you like, we can make you a deal. Anything at all. (Grabs a
few) But these are the three that Monica pre-approved

Well, thanks a lot for hookin’ me up Rach. I want you to know
that I want you to attend our wedding as my guest

I’m Monica’s maid of honor. Okay? Don’t try to blue pin
me

(sees another rack) Well, what’s the deal with these? These-these
look nice

Oh they are nice. We-we custom-make tuxedos for celebrities and then
when they’re done with them they just send ‘em back
You mean like for award shows
You mean like for award shows
You mean like for award shows

You mean these tuxes have been down the red carpet with people
yelling, "Who are you wearing?! You look fabulous!
Honey, might I suggest watching a little more ESPN and a little less E!
Okay, who wore those? (Points to the tuxedos.
Okay, who wore those? (Points to the tuxedos.
Umm, well let’s see uh, this one is Tom Brokaw
(reading a tag) This one is uh Paul O’Neil
He plays for the Yankees. Seriously, ESPN! Just once and a while, have it on in the background. (Chandler nods and Rachel grabs another tux) Ooh, this one was Pierce Brosnan
Oh, I have to get married in James Bond’s tux

Oh, it’s not just that, I would be England’s most powerful
weapon. Jet setting heartbreaker on her majesty’s secret service. A man who fears no
one; with a license to kill. (Worried.) Would Monica let me wear this

3.SceneDescription:
Central Perk, Chandler is on the couch reading as Ross enters carrying a
garment bag.

lines.Line: Hey! Guess what I got for your wedding! (Holding up his garment bag.
A freakish thin date with a hanger for her head

No. Rachel hooked me up with a tux! But not just any tux, Batman’s
tux

That’s right! Made expressly for Val Kilmer and worn by him in the
hit film…that Batman film he was in

You can’t wear that! I’m wearing the famous tux! James
Bond’s tux
So—If you wear that you’ll make mine less special

Well, you need something to make this day special? Hello! You-you-you have
the most special thing of all! You are marrying the woman you love
Please, don’t take away my cool thing. Please?! Pretty please?

Look, it’s my wedding day okay? If you were getting married I
would never do anything to upset you
When I got married you slept with my sister
When I got married you slept with my sister

4.SceneDescription: A restaurant, Melissa, Rachel, and Phoebe are talking.

lines.Line:
…anyway, his name is Allan and we’ve been going out for three
years. He was my first client when I became a party planner. He was planning a party for
his girlfriend at the time. Oh well. (Rachel and Phoebe politely laugh) And he was Theta
Beta Pi at Syracuse
Hmm Phoebe, were you ever in a sorority
Of course! Yeah, I was uh, umm Thigh Mega Tampon

Yeah! Y’know, we were really huge too, but then they had to shut us
down when Regina Philange died of alcohol poisoning

Oh, isn’t a shame when one girl ruins it for the whole bunch?
(Phoebe agrees by grunting.

(changing the subject) Anyway, speaking of drinking too much. I was uh,
tellin’ Phoebe about that one crazy night after the Sigma Chi luau where you and I
uh, we made out

Remember?! We—come on, we both had the sarongs on, and we had the-the
coconut bikini tops

…we went back to the house and we got really silly and we…we made
out
Oh wow, Ray-ray I have no idea what you’re talking about
How can you not remember us kissing?

I don’t know. I don’t remember a lot of things that never
happened

Wh… Come on! Remember? We were on the sleeping porch! We
couldn’t stop giggling? And our coconuts kept knockin’ together
Oh, somewhere Joey’s head is exploding
Oh, somewhere Joey’s head is exploding

Yeah—but come on—Listen, I’m sorry I don’t want to
make you uncomfortable, but I told Phoebe that it happened and she doesn’t believe
me

I’m sorry Ray-ray. I mean if I thought it happened I would say it.
Maybe I passed out and you did stuff to me while I was sleeping

Rachel, it’s okay. You don’t have to do this. I believe you.
All right? Okay, if-if you say that you kissed Melissa, then you kissed Melissa

6.SceneDescription: Outside the restaurant, Melissa, Phoebe, and Rachel are emerging.

lines.Line: It happened! I am telling you it happened

Okay. (To Phoebe) Well, it was great meeting you. And uh Rachel, I-I
don’t think I’ll be calling you (hails a cab) because umm, y’know
you’ve gotten weird. (The cab pulls up.) Take care you guys
She’s about to get in when…
She’s about to get in when…

What?! Wait a minute! No wait a minute! (She does so.) Okay? Look, that
night was the one wild thing I have ever done in my entire life, and I’m not
gonna let you take that away from me! Okay, so if you don’t remember that, maybe
you will remember this! (She grabs Melissa and kisses her on the lips.

Of course I remember our kiss. I think about it all the time. I can
still hear the coconuts knockin’ together I… (Phoebe is shocked.) I just
didn’t want to tell you ‘cause I didn’t think that you’d return my
love, and now that you have… (Leans in to kiss Rachel.

Aww, look who’s being suddenly shy. You can’t tell me you
don’t feel what I feel. Nobody can kiss that good and not mean it. (Goes in again.
(moves away again) I-I-I-I’m just…I’m just a good kisser
(moves away again) I-I-I-I’m just…I’m just a good kisser

(laughs) Oh you don’t have to be (Laughs again) sorry.
I’m…I’m obviously kidding. I’m not in love with you. (To Phoebe)
I’m not in love with her. I don’t hear coconuts banging together. Yeah, I
don’t…picture your face when I make love to my boyfriend. Anyway, I gotta go.
Eh…kiss good-bye? (Rachel stares at her stunned.) No? Okay. (Hurries into the cab and
drives off.
Wow! I mean I had no idea that that was gonna

lines.Character: (Suddenly, Phoebe leans in and kisses her on the lips
lines.Line: Suddenly, Phoebe leans in and kisses her on the lips!
